field.name: description
field.value: When doing this the name of the output file should also be changed to prevent confusion with builds from the trunk, propably appending the major and minor version like this in cruise.build: <property name="build.zip.file" value="castleproject-build_${CCNetLabel}-${framework::get-target-framework()}-${project.config}.zip" dynamic="true" /> becomes <property name="build.zip.file" value="castleproject-${project.major}.${project.minor}-build_${CCNetLabel}-${framework::get-target-framework()}-${project.config}.zip" dynamic="true" />
